tool.name: Locate CDR3 anchors
tool.description: for generating and/or evaluating CDR3 sequences.
tool.command:
immuno-probs
## general immuno-probs parameters -separator '$optional.separator' -threads \$GALAXY_SLOTS
## tool command locate-cdr3-anchors
## reference genomic templates -ref '$input.cond_gene.gene' '$input.cond_gene.file'
## specify the mofifs
#for $i in $input.repeat_motif
-motif '$i.motif'
#end for

param.name: separator
param.label: In/out file separator character
param.help: The separator character to be used when writing files.

param.name: gene
param.label: For which gene should anchors be located?

param.name: file
param.label: Reference genomic template - V gene
param.help: Needs to conform to IGMT annotation.

param.name: file
param.label: Reference genomic template - J gene
param.help: Needs to conform to IGMT annotation.

tool.help:
**ImmunoProbs**
Create IGoR models and calculate the generation probability of V(D)J and CDR3 sequences.
For documentation have a look at the ImmunoProbs wiki "https://github.com/penuts7644/ImmunoProbs/wiki".
